ReportText: *RADIOLOGY REPORT* Clinical Data: Left-sided chest pain, shortness of breath, cough, history of lung cancer CHEST - 2 VIEW Comparison: Chest x-ray of 09/19/2013 Findings: There is a moderate size left pleural effusion with volume loss in the left hemithorax. A probable left hilar mass is noted. The right lung is clear. Heart size is stable. IMPRESSION: Moderate size left pleural effusion. Probable left hilar mass. Original Report Authenticated By: [[PERSONALNAME], M.D.
